info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:09PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Hillsdale, northern Williams and Fulton Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fayette to near Edon. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Fayette around 215 PM EDT. Pioneer around 220 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wauseon, West Unity, Stryker, Archbold, Swanton and Delta. This includes Interstate 80 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 45. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
